rows.label: qst004102_msg0001
rows.name:
Go straight from Torigo till you see
Twin Trunks Hill. The Tirkin Turf is on
top of that tree there.

rows.label: qst004102_msg0002
rows.name:
They've built some impressive
structures, so you'll know when
you're there.

rows.label: qst004102_msg0101
rows.name: Made it back in one piece, eh?

rows.label: qst004102_msg0102
rows.name:
Mind telling me how the
Revenge Tirkin launched
their attacks?

rows.label: qst004102_msg0103
rows.name:
I know, I know. But I've got to give
my superior some kind of report to
keep them happy.

rows.label: qst004102_msg0104
rows.name:
Whew. Sounds like a rough bunch
indeed.

rows.label: qst004102_msg0105
rows.name:
That info'll come in very handy if they
ever attack us again.

rows.label: qst004102_msg0106
rows.name:
Thanks for that. Here's your reward,
as promised: one Filament Globe!
